entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clear. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 04 January 2023
